title: 2BR/1Bath, Sunny 12th Floor Home, 2nd Rm Great for Office Space!
posting_body: ['Welcome to The Civic!', '2 bed / 1 bath / 791 Sq.', 'Ft.', '* Base Rent $3,952', '* Rate Based on 12 Month Term', '* Unit 1206 - Available 08/06/22', '3D Virtual Tour of Floorplan:', '<URL>', 'The Civic', 'Website:', '<URL>/', 'Address:', '101 Polk St San Francisco, CA 94102', 'Call Us Today!', 'show contact info', 'Property Description', 'The Civic currently has a two-bedroom, one-bathroom apartment available for lease.', 'Your potential residence has a kitchen with stainless steel appliances and quartz countertops for a more sophisticated design.', 'In addition, you’ll have European-style cabinetry with self-closing drawers.', 'This home features floor-to-ceiling windows to bring a natural glow to the interior.', ' Outside your apartment, you can make the most of a roof deck with a fourteen-foot concrete fire table.', 'You’ll live near some of the city’s best cultural establishments, namely the Asian Arts Museum and the San Francisco Symphony.', 'Get in touch with the leasing office of The Civic today to arrange a tour around this GreenPoint-certified community.', 'Lease Terms:', '12 - 15 months options (rates may vary)', 'Parking:', 'Type', '- Garage Lot', 'Fee', '- $350.00', 'Garage Stackers', 'Pet Policy:', 'Cat, Dog s are allowed.', 'We welcome 2 pets per home.', 'There is a $500 Pet Deposit.', 'Aggressive breeds are prohibited.', 'Please call our office for more details.', 'Building Type:', 'High Rise', 'Year Built:', '2015', 'Units:', '162', 'Office Hours', 'Monday', ':\u2002\u2002 9:00am to 5:00pm', 'Tuesday', ':\u2002\u2002 9:00am to 5:00pm', 'Wednesday', ':\u2002\u2002 9:00am to 5:00pm', 'Thursday', ':\u2002\u2002 9:00am to 5:00pm', 'Friday', ':\u2002\u2002 9:00am to 5:00pm', 'Saturday', ':\u2002\u2002 9:00am to 5:00pm', 'Sunday', ':\u2002\u2002 Closed', 'Management Company:', 'Emerald Fund, Inc.', 'Call Us Today or Text Message!', 'show contact info', 'Equal Housing Opportunity']
